name: Ruins of Minmar!
description:
You find yourself separated from your kinsfolk and lost in a vast, treacherous wasteland that was once the heart of a glorious civilization. You know nothing of the ancient secrets that lie beneath your feet, but with a little cunning and a lot of luck you may find your salvation within the RUINS OF MINMAR!

I made this as a CS50 final project, but if anyone has any interest and wants to give me some suggestions I would be very grateful.

I made the musical score but most of the images were taken from https://opengameart.org/ except for the main character who came from u/Nozueb. Thank you very much!
